title: Print, "Two Designs for Metal Gates and Panels, from Nouveau Livres de Serrieure", ca. 1700
medium: Engraving and black ink on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed below the top design in black ink is a label written in french.
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Two designs for ornate gates pictured on top and bottom of design. Both gate designs have ornate iron tracery work.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Two Designs for Metal Gates and Panels, from Nouveau Livres de Serrieure", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Engraving and black ink on cream laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-9.
